verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:12
verses.text: Even so ye, forasmuch as ye are zealous of spiritual gifts, seek that ye may excel to the edifying of the church.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:13
verses.text: Wherefore let him that speaketh in an unknown tongue pray that he may interpret.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:14
verses.text: For if I pray in an unknown tongue, my spirit prayeth, but my understanding is unfruitful.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:15
verses.text: What is it then? I will pray with the spirit, and I will pray with the understanding also: I will sing with the spirit, and I will sing with the understanding also.
